text: Hi everyone! I´ve just cloned one of the website theme folders..but the cloned template is totally different from the original one plus inclufing some errors that are not showed in the original one. Anyone has experience by cloning theme folders? Should I consider something on settings before cloning the original theme? thank you so much for your help :wink:
It’s likely the file references to the other theme folder name. I’d check those
hi all! does anyone know if it’s possible to move an existing page from the Websites tab to Staging?
but I can’t see this Stage button on this page:
Hi There, You need to go to content staging and there you need to select "Unmodified" tab in the left side. In that You need to search for your website page and there you will find the stage button.
